text: No More Sadface is the fourth EP released by the Denver, Colorado based trio Single File. It features the radio hit "Zombies Ate My Neighbors" and was their first release on Reprise Records."http://www.absolutepunk.net/showthread.php?t=222038""http://music.barnesandnoble.com/search/product.asp?r=1&ean;=93624994213" ==Track listing== # "Zombies Ate My Neighbors" – 3:04 # "Velcro" – 3:09 # "Melody of You" – 2:40 # "September Skyline" – 3:15 ==Personnel== *Sloan Anderson—Vocals, Guitar, Bass Guitar *Joe Ginsberg—Bass, Guitar, Backing Vocals, Piano *Chris Depew -- drums, Backing Vocals, Piano ==References== Category:2007 EPs
title: No More Sadface
